name: Matchy Match
description:
Gamejam Theme - "60 Seconds"

In MATCHY MATCH, the goal is MATCHING linked nodes together in under 60-seconds!



Controls:

L Mouse: Lock a Node

R Mouse: Unlock a Node

Secret Tip:

Clicking L & R Mouse repeatedly can cycle through a node faster (by locking/unlocking) - this technique will be effective towards the end of levels and late game!

----------

Thanks for playing!

-RJ

@SEEDZANDTWIGZ
